pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a dramatic time-lapse video of a massive, rotating supercell storm cloud at night. Internal lightning illuminates the stacked, saucer-like structure from within, causing it to glow with an eerie purple and white light. The storm appears to hover over a dark landscape as it evolves and unleashes a curtain of rain.
